::KitKat::

She looked at Time Bomb, "Please get up. I'm going to hurt either of 
you.  You have to understand, I"m going to hurt you.  I won't let 
others hurt you.  OK? No one is going to haul off and hurt you.  Now 
knock it off and let's go hunting?"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Time Bomb wakes up and smiles at KitKat, then frowns. He lays down 
on the
> floor and waits to be beaten.
> 
> "He's waiting for you to punish him." Land Mine said, acting quite 
calm.
> Time Bomb looked up at KitKat. There were arrays or scars on his 
back, from
> everything from nails, to whip burns (Spiked whips, they can dent 
metal and
> damage organics) to cuts and burns...
